present.english: The happy child plays the new game
The young boys play the popular sport

imperfect.english: I was playing the fun sport
The happy child was playing the new game
The young boys were playing the popular sport

future.english: I will play the fun sport
The happy child will play the new game
The young boys will play the popular sport

aorist.english: The happy child played the new game
The young boys played the popular sport

optative.english: I should play the fun sport

optative.georgian: ბედნიერმა ბავშვმა უნდა ითამაშოს ახალი თამაში
optative.english: The happy child should play the new game

optative.georgian: ახალგაზრდა ბიჭებმა უნდა ითამაშონ პოპულარული სპორტი
optative.english: The young boys should play the popular sport

imperative.english: You all (you formal), play the exciting sport
